Articles.Content: Hello, I looked briefly through the forums but I haven't found anyone post this before. Has anyone noticed a change in music with the latest update? Could be with 1.0 also, I haven't tried it. What I mean is that the transition to music feels different. When I got into space at the 70km mark, it used to start this classical "into space" kerbal theme. However now, it is kind of the same but starts mid track and feels awkward. Could it be a bug or an intentional change or? I have to admit it annoys me a lot more than it should, it is just that the transition it had before of going into space felt kind of magical and now just weird. Has anyone noticed any difference in the music in any case?
It's a bug that's been around for a while.
Oh really? It is the first time it has happened to me, never experienced it on 0.90 or a few previous versions before that.
What about really long times between sound tracks? Is that a bug or was it programmed to give you quiet time to reflect upon your actions against Jeb?
I think it's just waiting for the next cue to start a new song.
